oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Postcard portrait of Doris Adkins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Postcard portrait of Doris Adkins, first child of Grover Cleveland and Ethel Adkins. Doris was born in 1910 and died in 1916 at the age of 5 due to cancer of the kidneys.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adkins, Doris, 1910-1916; Children; Portraits
